document.full_text: wall street edged higher on thursday after six days of losses as a narrowed u.s. trade deficit was seen as one positive point for growth in a recent avalanche of weak economic data.
document.title: wall street edges higher on trade data, mood fragile
lines_and_colors: wall street edged higher on thursday after six days of losses as a narrowed u.s. trade deficit was seen as one positive point for growth in a recent avalanche of weak economic data.
